message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering the product to you for $1500000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price for this product, considering its value to me.

I understand that $1200000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1350000. I believe this price still represents a fair value for the product, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not sure if $1350000 is the right price for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me.

I understand that you're looking to get a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much value. I'm counteroffering at $1250000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $1250000 is the right price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1150000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, but I'm still not willing to meet your price of $1150000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make sure I'm not giving away too much value. I'm counteroffering at $1200000, which is $50000 more than your last offer. This is my last compromise, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not willing to pay $1200000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1175000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too close to the wire, and I'm not sure if we'll be able to come to an agreement. I'm willing to make one final offer, but I need to make sure it's a price that I'm comfortable with. I'm counteroffering at $1200000, which is the same price I offered in round 7. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
